description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

@Icon[type:graviton] Graviton Revelation

You‘re surrounded by a gravitational field that keeps environmental effects at bay. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.SlcJqS0Ui9sP1Z7x]{Environmental Adaptation}COM as a bonus feat even if you don’t meet the prerequisites, and you can use either your Charisma or Constitution modifier to determine how many environmental conditions and weather conditions to choose from that feat. When you become fully attuned, you can choose an additional environmental condition or weather condition presented in Environmental Adaptation. This additional adaptation lasts until you are no longer fully attuned.
